name: de Nederlandse Orde van Belastingadviseurs (the Dutch Association of Tax Advisers)
goal:
1.The objective of the association is to look after the common interests of its members and to promote the high-quality practice of the profession by the members of the association.

2.The association seeks to achieve this objective by:
a.promoting the (university) tax adviser study programme at officially recognised institutes of higher education;
b.providing supplementary training for members of the association;
c.maintaining independent disciplinary rules;
d.contributing to the promotion of the quality of tax legislation and the tax climate for establishing a business;
e.all other lawful means which may benefit the objective of the association.
euInitiatives:
